Text.Page: [Meet up with {@linkcreature:183#7002#Ramull}, the Ace Dungeon Instructor, over in Highwatch.

You must be ! I've heard so much about you from Dougal, it's like we're already friends.

I'm looking for someone like you—skilled and competent—to help tune the federation's training exercises.

We've created something called an Ace Dungeon to hone your skills, using reports of your past adventures.

Give it a whirl and let us know what you think."Will do."

Great, thank you!
I think Ace Dungeons are a little too difficult for a standard federation operative, but you veterans will definitely benefit from the experience.

Here, take this as a token of our appreciation, and come and train whenever you like.
